name: week-one-toy-problem
description: Check Speed // Function calculates demerit points and rounds them using 'math.floo' // checkspeed function is used to evalute the speed of a car and then determines if it has gone beyond the predefined speed limit //constant ; THe speed limit has been set to 70 as the maximum allowed //kmPerDemeritPoind, set at 5 every km above the maximum with 5km one gets 1 demerit point //If within the speed limit the console logs ok //If your demerit point goesabove 12 you get a liscence suspended
